title: Kozmo
desc: Kozmo, the bold explorer embodies curiosity and courage where he's the drive to go beyond.

title: Ëena

title: Dogzilla
desc: Dogzilla, the steadfast guardian, stands for protection, loyalty, and strength.

title: Leeloo
desc: Leeloo, the quiet sage, carries the wisdom that binds them all together.

title: Digital marketing solutions
desc: Together, they made the KidzMondo Constitution, a promise that every child would grow in a world built on respect, equality, and empathy. Their spirit shapes everything within the city: its culture, its play, and its purpose. Through them, KidzMondo isn’t just imagined, it’s governed by values that turn every child into a citizen of possibility.
